text: Nazareno monument on Caripito Caripito is a city in the state of Monagas, Venezuela. It has around 50,000 inhabitants. It is the third largest city in the state, after Maturín and Punta de Mata. == Public and historic spaces == * Iglesia Sagrado Corazón de Jesús (Church Sacred Heart of Jesus): It was built in 1936. * Monumento al Nazareno (Monument to the Nazarene): Built in 2005. It is an image of the Nazarene, 20 meters high. Category:Cities in Monagas Category:Populated places established in 1734
title: Caripito
